title: Blended Learning-Based Civil Litigation Fundamentals Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic legal terminology comprehension and corporate decision-making experience
context.additional_context: In a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, experiencing actual civil litigation procedures through VR simulation, with flipped learning implementation via mobile platforms like KakaoTalk

learning_goals: Learners can recreate the three stages of civil litigation procedures (filing, adjudication, judgment) via VR simulation.
Learners can select litigation strategies for dispute types with over 80% accuracy by analyzing cases provided on a WeChat-like platform.
Learners can practice submitting written evidence and argumentation procedures at least three times through mock trial role-playing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
